name: SymphonybyWaterFurnace
0:
”Alexa, set the thermostat to 70.”
”Alexa, set the thermostat to heat.”
”Alexa, what is the temperature in the living room?”

des: Control your Symphony thermostats from Alexa. Supports both single and zoned systems.
